fallback.pageNotFoundDesc: Sorry, we couldn't find the page you're looking for.
fallback.forbiddenDesc: Sorry, you don't have permission to access this page.
fallback.internalErrorDesc: Sorry, the server encountered an error.
fallback.offlineErrorDesc: Sorry, unable to connect to the internet. Please check your network connection and try again.

http.requestTimeout: Request timed out, please try again later.
http.networkError: Network error, please check your connection and try again.
http.badRequest: Bad request. Please check your input and try again.
http.unauthorized: Login session expired. Please log in again to continue.
http.forbidden: Access forbidden, you do not have permission to access this resource.
http.notFound: Not found, the requested resource does not exist.
http.internalServerError: Internal server error, please try again later.

widgets.logoutTip: Do you want to log out?
widgets.checkUpdatesDescription: Click to refresh for the latest version

authentication.loginSubtitle: Please enter your account information to start your learning and work today
authentication.id_cardTip: Please enter an 18-digit ID card number
authentication.signUpSubtitle: Make your learning and work simple and fun
authentication.agreeTip: Please agree to the privacy policy and terms
authentication.passwordStrength: Use 8 or more characters with a mix of letters, numbers, and symbols
authentication.forgetPasswordSubtitle: Enter your email and we'll send you a link to reset your password
authentication.emailValidErrorTip: The email format you entered is incorrect
authentication.qrcodeSubtitle: Please scan the QR code with your phone to log in
authentication.qrcodePrompt: After scanning, click 'Confirm' to complete the login
authentication.codeSubtitle: Please enter your phone number to start managing your projects
authentication.loginAgainSubTitle: Your login session has expired, please log in again to continue.
authentication.usernameErrorTip: Username format is incorrect, at least 4 characters
authentication.id_cardErrorTip: ID card number format is incorrect, must be 18 digits
authentication.phoneErrorTip: Phone number format is incorrect, must be 11 digits
authentication.passwordErrorTip: Password format is incorrect, at least 8 characters
authentication.agreePolicyErrorTip: Please agree to the privacy policy and terms
authentication.loginError: Login failed, please check your username and password
authentication.realnameChineseErrorTip: Real name must be in Chinese characters
